casebody.data:
IN RE: ESTATE OF W. A. JACKSON; PURITAN MILLS, INC., a Corporation under the Laws of Georgia v. MILTON O. HOLLIS, JR., as Administrator of the Estate of W. A. Jackson, deceased; Hillsborough Feed & Milling Company, a corporation; and Hermitage Feed Mills, a corporation. 36 So. (2nd) 276 June 15, 1948

June Term, 1948

Division A PER CURIAM:

Affirmed.
